paragraph: John downloaded the Pokemon Go app on 07/01/2017. By 07/12/2017, she was on level 8. Initially, she was very happy and glad with the app. However, she soon became very angry with the app because it was crashing very often. As soon as she reached level 8, she uninstalled the app.

Hua Min liked playing tennis. he first started playing on his 8th birthday - 07/07/1996. Playing tennis always made him sad. he won his first tournament on 08/12/2010. However, on 04/17/2015 when he was playing at the Flushing Meadows, he had a serious injury and had to retire from his tennis career.
